Class FluidMachinery

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.engineering.fluids.FluidMachinery
public class FluidMachinery extends Object
Fluid machinery calculations. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot

  • Constructor Details

    • FluidMachinery

      public FluidMachinery()

  • Method Details

    • hydraulicPower

      public static double hydraulicPower(double density, double flowRate, double head)
      Pump hydraulic power. P_h = ρ * g * Q * H
      Parameters:
      density - Fluid density (kg/m³)
      flowRate - Volume flow rate (m³/s)
      head - Total head (m)
      Returns:
      Hydraulic power (W)

    • pumpEfficiency

      public static double pumpEfficiency(double hydraulicPower, double shaftPower)
      Pump efficiency. η = P_hydraulic / P_shaft

    • affinityFlowRate

      public static double affinityFlowRate(double Q1, double N1, double N2)
      Affinity laws: flow rate vs speed. Q1/Q2 = N1/N2

    • affinityHead

      public static double affinityHead(double H1, double N1, double N2)
      Affinity laws: head vs speed. H1/H2 = (N1/N2)²

    • affinityPower

      public static double affinityPower(double P1, double N1, double N2)
      Affinity laws: power vs speed. P1/P2 = (N1/N2)³

    • npshAvailable

      public static double npshAvailable(double atmosphericPressure, double suctionHeight, double frictionLoss, double vaporPressure, double density)
      Net Positive Suction Head available. NPSH_a = P_atm/ρg + z_s - h_f - P_v/ρg
      Parameters:
      atmosphericPressure - P_atm (Pa)
      suctionHeight - z_s (m, negative if below pump)
      frictionLoss - h_f (m)
      vaporPressure - P_v (Pa)
      density - ρ (kg/m³)

    • cavitationNumber

      public static double cavitationNumber(double pressure, double vaporPressure, double density, double velocity)
      Cavitation number. σ = (P - P_v) / (0.5 * ρ * V²)

    • specificSpeed

      public static double specificSpeed(double rpm, double flowRate, double head)
      Specific speed (dimensionless). N_s = N * √Q / H^(3/4)

    • turbinePower

      public static double turbinePower(double efficiency, double density, double flowRate, double head)
      Turbine power output. P = η * ρ * g * Q * H

    • peltonJetVelocity

      public static double peltonJetVelocity(double head, double velocityCoefficient)
      Pelton wheel jet velocity. V_jet = C_v * √(2gH)

    • peltonOptimalBucketSpeed

      public static double peltonOptimalBucketSpeed(double jetVelocity)
      Optimal bucket speed for Pelton wheel. u = V_jet / 2

    • runnerSpeed

      public static double runnerSpeed(double diameter, double rpm)
      Francis turbine runner speed. u = π * D * N / 60

    • isentropicWork

      public static double isentropicWork(double gamma, double R, double T1, double P1, double P2)
      Compressor isentropic work. W = (γ/(γ-1)) * R * T1 * ((P2/P1)^((γ-1)/γ) - 1)

    • fanFlowRate

      public static double fanFlowRate(double Q1, double D1, double D2, double N1, double N2)
      Fan laws (same as affinity laws).
